sys_script_include.name: GetDept

sys_update_version.name: sys_script_include_524c24f02f85b110f1c757892799b6f3
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_include"><sys_script_include action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><access>package_private</access><active>false</active><api_name>x_58872_needit.GetDept</api_name><caller_access/><client_callable>false</client_callable><description>Get User's department</description><name>GetDept</name><script><![CDATA[var GetDept = Class.create();
GetDept.prototype = Object.extendsObject(global.AbstractAjaxProcessor, {

	getDpt: function() {
		// Create a GlideRecord for the User table.
        var userRecord = new GlideRecord("sys_user");
		// Use the sysparm_userID passed from the client side to retrieve a record from the User table.
        userRecord.get(this.getParameter('sysparm_userID'));
		// Return the Manager for the requested record
        return userRecord.department.getDisplayValue() + '';
	},
	
   type: 'GetDept'
});]]></script><sys_class_name>sys_script_include</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>admin</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2023-08-31 12:29:00</sys_created_on><sys_id>524c24f02f85b110f1c757892799b6f3</sys_id><sys_mod_count>2</sys_mod_count><sys_name>GetDept</sys_name><sys_package display_value="NeedIt" source="x_58872_needit">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_package><sys_policy>read</sys_policy><sys_scope display_value="NeedIt">6ead8e780f603200cd674f8ce1050ed1</sys_scope><sys_update_name>sys_script_include_524c24f02f85b110f1c757892799b6f3</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-09-04 23:36:45</sys_updated_on></sys_script_include></record_update>
